[Diehard](/Feats.aspx?ID=5140) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 254 <sup>2.0</sup>

It takes more to kill you than most. You die from the dying condition at dying 5, rather than dying 4.

<title level="2">Diehard leads to...</title>
[Numb to Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=6494)
